lines.text: Why don't we just take out a loan?
Are you out of your mind? We're going to get nailed.
This isn't Miami, you know. Every cop they have'll be swarming over that market. If we hit another right now they won't be ready.
They won't be ready? I'm not ready! I haven't done this since I was 17!
I don't know.I think he wanted to kill me.

[George is crossing river when he loses his clothes]
AH AH AH AH AH! My fucking clothes! In the fucking river!

[about sleeping man in backseat]
Who's he? You seem to know everybody here, who's he then.

[They stare at the man]
Guess it's not fair not knowing who he is now that he knows who we are.

[man wakes up]
Guess I'm not as famous as you guys. Nick Bartowski. Glad to meet you. Now we can be best friends. Well wake me when we get there then I'll get your fucking autographs.
The place next door is a real-estate office. We pick the lock. We get in, and go through the wall. It is made of brick, like your brain. It's one foot thick, two layers.
[Carlos opens a door running out of a building wearing a stocking over his head]
Go, go, go, go, go, go, go, go, go, go, go, go, go!
